Replace.Text: OK OK OK, it's not a bad thing to have more friends
I asked Sifangyuan, they wouldn't consider this matter
Are you willing to be my partner?
Very good!
Uh... OK
I'm not afraid of you
This net of heaven and earth is waiting for you!
As a messenger, I will treat you well
I'm very busy now, no time or time
I brought some flowers and candied haws, I hope you can receive them
Eh? Did I do something wrong?
I still trust you so much, so you are such a person!
Hello, what's the matter? My name is Linyu
Are you a guest who came to visit Sifangyuan? I can take you to see
OK OK OK, then do you have candied haws there?
You are a guest from afar. Can you tell me where you came from?
Wow, why are there so many people?
OK, it turned out to be passed by, scared me
You have expanded and are very close to us. Please find another place.
you....
If you want to know Sifang Academy, why don’t you communicate with everyone, but rely on this kind of dirty method?
You're so dirty...
You people spread fallacies and evil stories everywhere in Sifangyuan, and you have to come out to take care of these people!
You actually...
It's causing trouble for everyone...
Thank you so much
Thank you so much
Thank you so much
It's a pity that I didn't make the deal
It's a pity that I didn't make the deal
It's a pity that I didn't make this deal
There are a lot of things here that I have never seen before, I have to study them carefully
Lin Yu really likes civilization that attaches importance to industrial development
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat power, from Linyu Leadership Features
Tianyuan Divine Realm-Qiaogu
The Gods of Amagaki
Lin Yu
"Don't be proud and complacent because of temporary progress." I will remember this sentence! However, I am really happy to be praised by the administrator
Ring the bell

Upgrading units will not end their turn, all units ignore the terrain and the [ICON_Movement] movement penalty across rivers, and there is no movement power consumption when boarding and disembarking. Allow melee and ranged corrections to fight on the waters, military units located on the waters +15[ICON_Strength] combat power, your merchant unit is immune to the plunder of water cells, after creating a trade route, the trade station will appear immediately in the destination city

When I helped Teacher Zhiming manage the affairs of Tianli Pavilion, I spent most of my time in the laboratory and dealt with various devices all day long... Some people say that part of my growth was experiencing such loneliness. But I don’t feel this way. Maybe because the mechanism is really interesting, and I can get to know everyone and stand with everyone because of this, right? ——Lin Yu
Institutional teacher
Favoring a civilization with strong industrial power
